name: Explore the dungeon
description:
Walk - Arrows/WASD

shoot - Mouse

bomb - E

to play in a mobile device, click in the cog in the bottom left corner before pressing play and select Mobile Mode

Mobile mode controls:

walk - click

shoot - double click/click and hold

bomb - bomb button 

Little piece of lore:

After all the naturals disasters in the overworld, the chickens runned to the underground, trying to have a peaceful live once again. But it will not be so easy. The resources of the CUB (Chicken Underground Base) were running out! Now, only one chicken is brave enough to explore the dungeon and save the chickens of extinction once and for all.
